ftbquests.chapter.internal.title: Internal
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest1.de: The Modpack is called &3Create: Factory Builder&r for a reason you know!
Now of course factories are not &2FREE&r, so you will have to buy one!
To get out &2money&r and to use it in the &3Shop&r equip your &3wallet&r in your Curios Slot (little cross next to player head when in inventory).
To access your &3Wallet&r, press the &c"O"&r key by default.
To take out &2money&r click the bill or coin you want to take out, you can hold &cshift&r while doing so to take out up to a stack at a time!
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest10.d: Umber Bricks, Short Umber Bricks, Stone, Oak Sign, Oak Hanging Sign, Realistic Torch
You can find them on the second page of the Factory Category in Tier 1
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest10.s: Needed to progress in quest line
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest11.d: Andesite, Oak Log, Copper Ingot, Iron Nugget, Copper Nugget, Iron Axe, Mechanical Saw, Deployer, Matchbox

ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest13.d: Check the Factory Guide for help!

ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest3.de: Use the press to make &38 iron sheets&r.
You can buy &3iron ingots&r in the &3material category&r!
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest4.de: By using the &3generator augment&r you can use the &3furnace&r to generate &3power&r, using &3fuel&r in the process.
This &3power&r can be turned into &3Rotational Force&r using the &3electric motor&r.
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest5.de: Gives less money than sell them in the shop but grants XP.
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest6.de: Make a &3copper ingot&r from smelting &3crushed raw copper&r.
ftbquests.chapter.introduction.quest7.de: You can find them on the first page of the Factory Category in Tier 1
New Repeatable Quest: Export Andesite Alloy
You can use the mixer and a basin to make andesite alloy with andesite and iron nuggets.

ftbquests.chapter.quests.quest1.descript: &3Tickets&r are a &2valuable resource&r, in order to get tickets you must &3trade items&r from the &3nether&r for them. Tickets can then be used in the &3Black Market&r to buy items for your factory back in the overworld, as a gift here is &250 tickets&r.
